author: jgm
content: There doesn't seem to be consensus on removing the index field and making the return value of the call a simple set of spec validator objects, as opposed to having a non-spec object that contains the spec validator plus its index.  I think that needs to be nailed down before we can proceed with the last tidy ups and look to merge this.
